projects.name: MyDukaan - E-commerce Application
projects.description: Designed and developed an e-commerce platform providing local businesses with a comprehensive online presence. Created a responsive and user-friendly interface, incorporating real-time updates and seamless navigation to enhance the user experience.

projects.name: Fire Fighter training using VR
projects.description: Created a immersive VR environment in Unity, including both first-person and third-person views. Incorporated a PASS(Pull, Aim, Squeeze, Sweep) method for using the extinguisher.

projects.name: PeerCode - Online Coding Platform for Peers
projects.description: Online Coding Platform where people can create contests with particular difficulty and topic and can participate whenever they want. REST API for fetching question data is used and Django ORM is used for handling Data and authentication.

experiences.description: Research Intern at CFEES (Centre for Fire, Explosive and Environment Safety) Developed a Virtual Training for Fire Fighters using UNITY Developed a Web Application Using HTML,CSS and JavaScript

full_output.name: Anurag Singh
achievements_and_awards: Top 30 in Bajaj FinServ and health Hackathon, went to Pune for Finals
